snippet.title: The Mountaineer - Video Game - Trailer
snippet.description:
The Mountaineer is an action adventure video game that tells the story of a brand new Super-Hero, named Pod, who is a self-trained mountaineer. Play as Pod to climb and conquer the mountains in "Meritorious Mountaineer" Championships.
Find and rescue the wounded mountaineers and find your way to the peak and complete your journey through beautiful and dangerous mountains.
Race with the other mountaineers from around the world until you witness that everything goes not as it planned, now you must face a deadly path that makes you to unleash your strength and give birth to the ultimate hero within.


https://www.niv-studio.com
#Mountaineer #SuperHero #Phod #Videogame #Action #Adventure #Comedy
